prompt: A photorealistic portrait of a teenager man with dark brown skin, straight hair, showing a clear disgust facial expression (upper lip raised), ultra-detailed RAW color photo, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, studio portrait, highly detailed skin, pores visible, sharp eyes, soft key light, rim light, natural color grading, natural window light, high dynamic range, 8k master
